(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Lhs 
          (Variable 
            (Identifier "__FILE__")))))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Lhs 
          (Variable 
            (Identifier "__LINE__")))))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Lhs 
          (Variable 
            (Identifier "__ENCODING__")))))))
